name: The Adventurous Explorer
description: You crave adrenaline and altitude and your perfect trip includes sweat, grit, and jaw-dropping stories of adventure. From scaling Angel’s landing and rappelling through desert canyons to soaring down Gooseberry Mesa on mountain bike, Greater Zion is your ultimate red rock playground.

name: The Dreamy Wanderer
description: You seek out beauty in every form – sculpted in stone, hung in a gallery, or performed under the stars. From the Tuacahn Amphitheatre to local art walks and historical tours, you savor the stories and culture that give Greater Zion its soul.

name: The Try-It-All-Trekker
description: You don’t want to miss a thing! From a sunrise hot air balloon ride and ATV rides in Sand Hollow State Park to dining al fresco before catching a Broadway-style musical under the stars at Tuacahn Amphitheatre, you thrive on a variety and live to pack your itinerary with adventure, art, and awe.
